Utilities

Utility functions.

Methods

<static> randomString(length)

Creates a random alphanumeric string.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
length Number

Character length of generated string.
Returns:
Type
String

<static> seedSort(array, order)

Sorts an array by shortest distance to comparator's seed.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
array Array.<Player>

The players to sort.
order 'asc' | 'des'

The order in which to sort players.

<static> shuffle(array)

Shuffles an array into a random order.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
array Array.<*>

An array of any objects.
